```{r}
# Assuming imp_total is a data frame and met.cd is a data frame

# Extract the column names from imp_total
imp_columns <- colnames(im001)

# Combine the two vectors into a data frame with only columns present in imp_total
df <- data.frame(Column = paste0("X", c(1:ncol(met.cd))), MetName = metname)
df_filtered <- df[df$Column %in% paste0("X", which(colnames(met.cd) %in% imp_columns)), ]

# Load xtable
library(xtable)

# Generate LaTeX table
latex_table <- xtable(df_filtered)

# # Print LaTeX code
# print(latex_table, type = "latex", include.rownames = FALSE)

```


```{r}
# Extract the column names from imp_total (assuming im001 is the same as imp_total here)
imp_columns <- colnames(im001)

# Filter column names in mic.cd based on imp_columns
filtered_columns <- colnames(mic.cd)[colnames(mic.cd) %in% imp_columns]

# Create a data frame combining the filtered column names from mic.cd and the miname vector
df <- data.frame(Column = filtered_columns, MetName = miname[1:length(filtered_columns)])

# Load the longtable package
library(xtable)

# Generate LaTeX table using longtable
latex_table <- xtable(df)

# # Print LaTeX code with longtable
# print(latex_table, type = "latex", include.rownames = FALSE, 
#       floating = FALSE, hline.after = c(-1, 0, nrow(df)))

```
